text: Ballads is a compilation album released on December 20, 2000 by American R&B; singer Mary J. Blige. It was released exclusively in Japan, which includes previously unreleased track "Overjoyed", a cover of Stevie Wonder. ==Track listing== ==External links== *Various – New York Undercover (CD, Album) *Various – Conception (CD, Album) *Various – Uptown MTV Unplugged (CD, Album) Category:Mary J. Blige albums Category:2000 compilation albums
title: Ballads (Mary J. Blige album)
